reviews.review:
Играю 30 часов 
Пока ничего плохого
Сначала не понимал какой там мидл, тёмка, шорт, и т.д.
теперь понял, но не помню
в общем, 100 убитых тиммейтов из 10
好玩 不用儲值 有公平性
классная игра только надо научиться играть а потом нормально
啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊
its just a big game of Click Head
jogo e bom agora que to jogando ficou melhor
我的名字极其符合我的技术

I'll be honest, I don't know why the fuck i have 59.2 hours, like holy shit did i really play that much??
I don't remember much about the game but hey if I got 50 plus hours on it, must be some good shit. 
So uuuh... go get this shit then
垃圾游戏 耗我钱财 毁我青春

People are so good in this game!! they can see through walls and shoot through them too!! every ones aim and reaction time is so good~!! all skill too for sure~~!!!

its fun and all but put me in the right rank valve

Counter-Strike is one of the most successful series in the gaming industry. The first game was released in 1999 and it defined the very genre of team-based shooters. Its most popular iteration is CS: Global Offensive, and it is an absolutely insane phenomenon game.
GOOD GAME PRETTY POG CHAMP NGL
great game if you wanna be depressed some times but also have insane hype 1 taps

good quality fun for the whole family!
